title: New: Mmoths – For Her (Feat. Young & Sick)
body:
Well this is a side to **Mmoths** we haven’t heard before.

Stripping right back to basics, and relying on the vocals of LA’s **Young & Sick**, it’s a marked progression, shifting the focus from the dreaded ‘beat-scene’ and instead shaping a track that’s by far his most elegant to date. Check out _For Her_ below and keep it locked for his next EP, **_Diaries_**, out 5 March. (Premiered via [The Fader](http://www.thefader.com/2012/11/13/stream-mmoths-f-young-sick-for-her/))
